testsuite.name: hifresh.RunCucumberTest

testcase.name: Add a recipe - Add recipe with subrecipe
Add a recipe - Add a step to a recipe
Add a recipe - Insert a step into a recipe
Calculate cost of a recipe - Calculate price of a recipe on a given date #DONE see calculaterecipecost.xslx
Calculate cost of a recipe - Calculate the price of a recipe with a subrecipe on a given date # MVP: suppose subrecipe is of exact quantity needed
